channel.title: The Inner Loop: DC | Blog Talk Radio Feed
channel.description: A free-wheeling discussion about life inside I-495 including references to pop culture, current events, politics and other subjects that affect the District. (Warning: Occasionally The Inner Loop may touch on subjects not suitable for minors. Listener discretion advised.)

item.title: TILDC - Talkin' Sports - Apr 19,2010
item.description:
